New Records: Paul Skenes became the fourth pitcher in MLB history to finish a season with a sub-2.00 ERA while averaging 11 or more strikeouts per nine innings
Skenes set a new franchise record, as opponents posted only a.198 batting average against the hurler, lowest by a Pirates starter all-time
Key Match Events: Paul Skenes struck out superstars Juan Soto and Aaron Judge
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates clubbed 5 homers in the win vs. Yankees
Others: Mike Burrows made his MLB debut vs. Yankees after long road to recovery from Tommy John surgery
